name: High-Yield Savings Account
description: Earn competitive interest rates with our high-yield savings account. No minimum balance and unlimited online transfers.

name: Premium Checking Account
description: Feature-rich checking account with no monthly fees, free ATM access worldwide, and overdraft protection.

name: Personal Loan
description: Quick approval personal loans with flexible terms and competitive rates. Use for debt consolidation, home improvement, or major purchases.

name: Home Mortgage
description: Fixed and adjustable rate mortgages for home purchases and refinancing. Expert guidance through the entire process.

name: Rewards Credit Card
description: Earn cashback on everyday purchases with our rewards credit card. Travel benefits and purchase protection included.

name: Investment Management
description: Professional investment management services with personalized portfolio strategies and retirement planning.

name: Mobile Banking App
description: Full-featured mobile banking with bill pay, mobile check deposit, and account alerts. Available for iOS and Android.
